name: places/ChIJeXV3hfBZwokR7215xzyhdDI
adrFormatAddress: 450 7th Ave, New York, NY 10123, USA

originalText.text: Ordered a $200 meal for delivery. Delivery window was 6-8. Called the restaurant to confirm everything, and found out the order was ready before 4 for pickup. Meanwhile it's still not delivered, well over 3 hours later. I'm not sure if this food will poison me being out this long, and their customer service is non existent. I recommend you avoid using this service unless you like potential food poisoning.

originalText.text:
This company is a scam! Google please take this service off your platform. Their lack of customer support has led to us getting into a credit card dispute with them. For background, we ordered like 150 worth of food. They didn't confirm the order in any way so about 1 hr before we were supposed to drive 20 minutes to pick up the food we called to cancel the order since they didn't confirm the order was placed. We called for 30 minutes and tried to cancel our order and we even called the restaurant to cancel the order.  We actually rebooked the order using a different service and got our food. After picking up our food we finally got the confirmation from HungryPanda that our original order was ready despite us canceling it in every way we could. So we refuted it with our credit card and they are fighting our dispute saying there's a no return policy.
HungryPanda please contact me to get this sorted.

it's terrible service. I never received the food and there is no way to contact them to find out what happened to my food.
I am planning to dispute the charge.

originalText.text: Their delivery people are terrible compared to others. They never bring the food upstairs.  I order because i have a 2 year old and i cant come downstairs in a instant. They would literally stay downstairs and call you 20x. Wouldnt it be easier to come up? I never have this issue with grubhub.

originalText.text: As a merchant, please stay away from this company. No customer service at all. Phone calls do not go through. If I were able to do everything in the app, i wouldnt have to be calling. The merchant account does not let you manage your menu prices at all.
